amendment.description: To provide funding for the construction of a statue of Harry S Truman in Kansas City, Missouri, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1766 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1766 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S11813-11814; text: CR S11814) To provide funding for the construction of a statue of Harry S Truman in Kansas City, Missouri, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1766 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1766 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Talent.
